price:
61. Waxaa khayr iyo barako badan (Allaah) ee u yeelay samada xiddigo waaweyn,    
 yeelayna dhexdeeda nal (qorrax) iyo dayax ifiya.
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجٗا وَقَمَرٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī jaʿala fī al-samāi burūjan wajaʿala fīhā sirājan waqamaran munīran
